title: Live Object Detection
description: Flutter app designed to automatically detect objects in real-time and zoom in to focus on them.

title: Sphurti 2024
description: Website created for our sports fest Sphurti, displaying event details and facilitating participant registrations.

title: Youthopia 2023
description: Flutter app and ReactJS website, backed by a NodeJS backend and MongoDB, facilitating event registration for participants at our annual fest, Youthopia.

title: Shreni Samudaya
description: Bilingual social media app for the Weaver community in Karnataka and nearby regions. Worked as a part of internship.

title: JSR Forms
description: A website and a mobile app that allows users to create customised forms and share them with a link.

title: NoQueue
description: NoQueue is a ticketless booking system for museums and monuments, utilizing a face detection algorithm to ensure secure and seamless entry for visitors who book tickets online.

title: PayQ
description: Payment App with automatic QR scanning, location-based shop details, UPI IDs, real-time updates on pending payments, and detailed analysis of shopping history to enhance financial management.

title: Anubhav App
description: Community app for the elderly, allowing them to log their daily status, connect with others, and participate in activities for their well being.

title: Arduino Graph
description: Flutter desktop Application for collecting data from Arduino and plotting it on a graph. Worked as a part of internship.
